Name: Healing Hymn
Extra information: You sing a soothing song that seals the wounds of you and your allies.
Rule:
Use this power during your Hero Phase.
You and one other Hero on your tile regain 2 Hit Points.

Name: Cleric's Shield
Extra information: You utter a minor defensive prayer as you strike your foe.
Rule:
Attack one adjacent Monster.
Hit or Miss: Choose 1 Hero on your tile. That Hero gains a +2 bonus to AC until you use this power again.

Name: Righteous Advance
Extra information: Your attack grants your ally time to advance.
Rule:
Attack one adjacent Monster.
Hit or Miss: One Hero on your tile moves 2 squares.

Name: Sacred Flame
Extra information: Sacred light shines from above, searing a single enemy with holy radiance.
Rule:
Attack one Monster within 1 tile of you.
If you hit, choose yourself or one Hero on your tile. That Hero gains 1 Hit Point.

Name: Blade Barrier
Extra information: You conjure a wall of whirling blades to cut apart advancing foes.
Rule:
Choose a tile within 2 tiles of you. Place five Blade Barrier tokens on five different squares on that tile.
When a Monster is placed on a square with a Blade Barrier token, remove that token and deal 1 damage to the Monster.

Name: Cause Fear
Extra information: Your holy symbol ignites with divine light, slamming your foes with uncontrollable terror.
Rule:
Choose a tile within 1 tile of you. Each ally on that tile adjacent to a Monster can make an At-Will attack with a +2 bonus to the Attack roll.
After the attacks, place each Monster remaining on a tile within 2 tiles of you.

Name: Wrathful Thunder
Extra information: When you strike, a shattering thunderclap fills the room.
Rule:
Attack one adjacent Monster.
After the attack, choose one Monster on your tile. Pass that Monster's card to the player on your right. That player now controls the Monster.

Name: Astral Refuge
Extra information: You send an ally to a safe refuge in the Astral Sea for a short time.
Rule:
Use this power at the start of any Villain Phase.
Choose one Hero within 2 tiles of you. Remove that Hero from the tile. At the start of that player's next Hero Phase, that player places the Hero on any tile.

Name: Command
Extra information: You utter a single word that your foe must obey.
Rule:
Use this power during your Hero Phase.
Choose one Monster on your tile. Place that Monster on a tile within 2 tiles of you.

Name: Perseverance
Extra information: A house does not stand with just a single wall.
Rule:
Use this power when any player draws an Encounter Card.
The cost to cancel the Encounter Card is reduced by the number of Heroes on your tile, including your own Hero.

Name: Dwarven Resilience
Extra information: Your dwarven heritage grants you uncommonly strong health.
Rule:
Use this power during your Hero Phase instead of moving.
You regain 4 Hit Points.

Name: Charge
Extra information: You rush into combat.
Rule: Move up to your speed, then attack one adjacent Monster.

Name: Reaping Strike
Extra information: You punctuate your scything attacks with wicked jabs and small cutting blows that slip through your enemy's defenses.
Rule: Attack one adjacent Monster twice.

Name: Sure Strike
Extra information: You trade power for precision.
Rule: Attack one adjacent Monster.

Name: Comeback Strike
Extra information: A timely strike gives you the strength to fight on.
Rule:
Attack one adjacent Monster.
If you hit, you regain 2 hit points.
If you miss, do not flip this card over.

Name: Into the Fray
Extra information: You unleash a fierce battle cry as you leap boldly into battle.
Rule: Place your Hero adjacent to any Hero within 2 tiles of you. Attack one adjacent Monster.

Name: Taunting Advance
Extra information: You rush forward and call forth your enemy.
Rule: Move your speed. Then choose a Monster within 2 tiles of you. Place that Monster adjacent to your Hero and attack it.

Name: Inspiring Advice
Extra information: You encourage your teammate to fight on.
Rule:
Use when a Hero misses a Monster with an attack.
The Hero rerolls the attack.
If the attack misses, do not flip this card over.

Name: One for the Team
Extra information: You protect your ally from the hazards of the dungeon.
Rule:
Use when any player draws an Encounter Card.
Resolve the Encounter Card as if you drew it.

Name: To Arms!
Extra information: You rally your companions to meet your foe head on.
Rule:
Use when a new Monster is placed on a tile.
You and one Hero on your tile can move your speed.

Name: Lay On Hands
Extra information: Your divine touch instantly heals wounds.
Rule: One adjacent Hero regains 2 hit points.

Name: Divine Challenge
Extra information: You boldly confront a nearby enemy.
Rule:
Choose one Monster within 1 tile of you. Place that Monster adjacent to your Hero.
Attack one adjacent Monster.

Name: Holy Strike
Extra information: You strike an enemy, igniting it with holy light.
Rule:
Attack one adjacent Monster.
If you started your Hero Phase adjacent to the Monster, deal +1 damage if you hit.

Name: Valiant Strike
Extra information: The odds against you add strength to your attack.
Rule:
Attack one adjacent Monster.
When making this attack, you get a +1 bonus to attack for each Monster adjacent to your Hero.

Name: Arcing Strike
Extra information: You swing your weapon in a wide arc.
Rule: Attack one or two adjacent Monsters.

Name: Benign Transposition
Extra information: You call upon divine power to switch places with an ally to strike a foe.
Rule:
Choose 1 Hero within 2 tiles of you. You swap positions with that Hero.
After swapping positions, attack one adjacent Monster.

Name: Righteous Smite
Extra information: Your righteous attack fills your party with preternatural resolve.
Rule:
Attack one adjacent Monster.
Hit or Miss: All Heroes on your tile regain 1 Hit Point.

Name: Bravery
Extra information: Your bravery gives you the power to fight on.
Rule:
Use when a Monster within 1 tile of you activates during any player's Villain Phase.
Place your Hero adjacent to that Monster. You regain 1 hit point.

Name: Noble Shield
Extra information: You quickly throw up your shield, protecting your friends from harm at your expense.
Rule:
Use when a Monster targets you and at least one additional Hero with the same attack.
You are the only target of the attack, but the attack roll against you is automatically a 20 and cannot be rerolled.

Name: Virtue's Touch
Extra information: Your gentle touch removes affliction.
Rule: Choose one adjacent Hero. End one condition on that Hero.

Name: Furious Assault
Extra information: Your wrath burns inside you, giving strength to your next attack.
Rule:
Use this power when you hit a Monster with an attack.
The Monster takes +1 damage.

Name: Distracting Jab
Extra information: You escape the clutches of your foe as it reacts to your attack.
Rule:
Attack one adjacent Monster.
If you hit, move the Monster 1 square.
After the attack, move your speed.

Name: Lucky Strike
Extra information: They fall for it if you're lucky, and then they fall.
Rule:
Attack one Monster within 1 tile of you.
If you hit and your attack roll is an even number, deal +1 damage.

Name: Positioning Shot
Extra information: To avoid your vicious attack, your enemy leaps exactly where you want it to be.
Rule:
Attack one Monster within 2 tiles of you.
Hit or Miss: Place that Monster on any square on your tile or on an adjacent tile.

Name: Acrobatic Onslaught
Extra information: After a quick strike, you leap through the air, lining up your next target.
Rule:
Attack one adjacent Monster.
Hit or Miss: Place your Hero on any tile within 2 tiles of where you started, and then use an At-Will power immediately.

Name: King's Castle
Extra information: It's hard to get the little guy when he's behind an ally who can crush plate armor in his teeth.
Rule:
Swap positions with one Hero within 1 tile of you.
Attack 1 Monster within 2 tiles of you.

Name: Tornado Strike
Extra information: Your weapon becomes a blur as you make swift, sweeping attacks.
Rule:
Attack four times. Each attack can be against any Monster on your tile.
After the attacks, place your Hero on any square on your tile.

Name: Distant Diversion
Extra information: The monster turns to investigate the sound of a thrown pebble.
Rule:
Choose one Monster within 3 tiles of you.
Place that Monster onto an adjacent tile.

Name: Practiced Evasion
Extra information: A quick flip and quicker fingers disables the trap.
Rule:
Use this power when you are hit by an attack from a Trap or Event Attack Encounter Card.
The attack misses. If the attack was from a Trap Encounter Card, you get a free Disable check against that Trap.

Name: Tumbling Escape
Extra information: You nimbly roll out of harm's way.
Rule:
Use this power when a Monster hits you with an attack.
The attack misses. Place your Hero on any tile within 1 tile of where you started.

Name: Hurled Breath
Extra information: You hurl your draconic breath, engulfing your foes a short distance away.
Rule:
Choose a tile within 2 tiles of you. Attack each Monster on that tile.
This attack does not count as an attack action.

Name: Arc Lightning
Extra information: Lightning leaps from your outstretched hands, blasting your foes.
Rule: Attack up to two Monsters. Each monster can be on your tile or any tile within 1 tile of you.

Name: Hypnotism
Extra information: Your enemy's mouth goes slack as your magic takes control.
Rule: Choose a Monster within 1 tile of you. Move that Monster 1 tile. If it ends adjacent to another Monster, make an attack against the second Monster.

Name: Ray of Frost
Extra information: A blistering ray of white frost streaks to your target, slowing its reactions.
Rule: Attack one Monster on your tile or on any tile within 2 tiles of you.

Name: Flaming Sphere
Extra information: You conjure a rolling ball of fire and control where it goes.
Rule:
Place 3 Flaming Sphere tokens in a stack on any square within 1 tile of you.
Instead of moving during your Hero phase, you can move the Flaming Sphere stack 1 tile.
At the end of your Hero Phase, you can remove 1 Flaming Sphere token and deal 1 damage to each Monster on that tile.

Name: Shock Sphere
Extra information: You hurl a crackling orb of lightning, engulfing your foes in its electric embrace.
Rule: Choose a tile within 2 tiles of you. Attack each Monster on that tile.

Name: Spectral Ram
Extra information: You bash your foe with arcane force that sends it reeling.
Rule:
Attack one Monster within 2 tiles of you.
Hit or Miss: Place the Monster onto any tile within 2 tiles of where it started.

Name: Invisibility
Extra information: You vanish from sight.
Rule:
Use this power during your Hero Phase.
Until the start of your next Hero Phase, you do not count as the closest Hero for any Monster's tactics.
Monster attacks that attack every Hero on a tile still attack you.

Name: Mirror Image
Extra information: You create three duplicate images of yourself.
Rule:
Use this power during your Hero Phase.
Place 3 Mirror Image tokens on your Hero Card.
For each Mirror Image token on your Hero Card, you gain +2 AC. Whenever a Monster misses you with an attack, remove 1 Mirror Image token.

Name: Wizard Eye
Extra information: You see through a magical hovering eye, allowing you to explore from a distance.
Rule:
Use this power during your Hero Phase.
Place the Wizard Eye token on a tile within 1 tile of you.
Instead of moving during your Hero Phase, you can move the Wizard Eye marker 1 tile.
During your Exploration Phase, you can explore as if your Hero was on any unexplored edge on the Wizard Eye's tile.
